Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Push harder, 21!'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Are your claws for show only?'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "I'm pushing. I'll destroy the car if I push any harder."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'But I think you can do it by yourself.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "You've been pushing the car without me for a while now."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What?! You piece of...'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Help push for a bit, No. 21.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You can take the wheel in ten more minutes.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "What about me? That's not fair!"}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You were just in the car! What else do you want?'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You were so terrible at this that I'd rather put a tree stump on the driver's seat."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory318.png'}
{3: 'It is a sunny dayâ€”a little too sunny, perhaps. The sun shines blatantly upon the asphalt road that lies within hundreds of miles of deserted fields and sands.'}
{3: 'The physical conditions of humans have determined that such an environment is not ideal for their survival. However, this place is a paradise for some other life forms.'}
{3: 'Lizards, bharals, hares, wolves, the flying vultures...'}
{3: '...And the members of Cerberus, who are pushing their car on an endless highway.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What kind of mission is this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "All the secrecy! What mission is so important that they're sending us to a barren place like this?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'How the hell would I know? That bedridden commandant just told us to arrive at the coordinates he sent us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You should be glad that you're not grounded for the mess you made.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "We're getting a call, Captain.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "We're getting a signal?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera lets go of the car, somersaulting onto the roof and sitting beside No. 21 before taking the comms device from her.'}
{3: "Losing Vera's help, Noctis almost trips and falls over underneath the car."}
{3: 'Vera motions to Noctis, now sitting on the ground with his legs crossed, to quiet down before standing up on the roof and waving the comms device around for a better signal.'}
{3: "This barren no man's land has always been a radio blind spot. There are only a few windows for them to connect with Babylonia every day, and each window lasts mere minutes."}
{2: 'Comms Device', 3: 'Bzzz... Bzzz...'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Why are the signals so bad here...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Comms Device', 3: 'Bzzz... Bzzz... Ve...'}
{2: 'Comms Device', 3: 'Vera...'}
{2: 'Comms Device', 3: 'Northwest... wagon...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: '...What direction are we heading?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We're on Route 77, 24 degrees northwest of where we started.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Comms Device', 3: 'Must... Med... Serums... You...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "What do we need those for? We haven't run into anyone on our way.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Comms Device', 3: 'Not... Components... Illegal... You... Bzzz... Problems...'}
{2: 'Comms Device', 3: 'You... Handle it yourselves.'}
{3: 'The voice from the comms turns into monotonous buzzing again.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "What does that mean? Why did they say we're... illegal?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "You didn't hide anything that got discovered by the higher-ups, did you?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Is this about those components and serums...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "We're done!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We couldn't have fixed your mess just with the supplies they sent us. I heard there's still a queue of people in the court-martial waiting to make you suffer.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I can leave you to fend for yourself next time. How does that sound? Still feel like joking?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "I... don't think that's what it was.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'The message was designated "mission briefings" when I got the call.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Maybe it was about this mission.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What about the direction? Are we heading in the right direction?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Didn't they say northwest? I told you we're northwest of where we started.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'How long do we still need to push, then?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "There's a rest zone five kilometers ahead of us on the map.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Five kilometers?!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Keep pushing.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Vera throws the comms device at No. 21 and jumps down next to Noctis, giving him a light kick to get him to stand up and start pushing.'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, No. 21 continues to sit on the roof, humming an unknown tune like she did before.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Hey, 21! Why aren't you in the car and holding the steering wheel?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "I've tied up the steering wheel.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'The car will drive straighter this way than it did with Noctis behind the wheel.', 4: '1'}
